description: See individual entries Royal blue & purple warp. Turquoise, olice, metallis bue & green weft. Plain weave variation. Left selvedge. same in appearance as 99.1.1197.60, but has a stiffer hand. (royal blue, purple, turquoise, olive, metalic blue & green)
